abstract.text: Get to know Xcode Cloud, Apple‚Äôs continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) service for building apps and frameworks for all Apple platforms. Find out how Xcode Cloud can improve both the productivity of your team and the quality of your products. We‚Äôll show you how to start your first build, use a build report to fix issues, and collaborate with your team.
Xcode 16, Swift 6, iOS 18, macOS 15 (Sequoia), tvOS 18, visionOS 2, watchOS 11.
